Gotin: "Beguman hun hey ji rast ve dihatine me

Veca gotina perwerdekare me li ser me pewiat e. Beguman eme her tam bikin

Veca beguman ew we roje di ezab de hempar in
Beguman em bi sucdaren gunehkar her wuha dikin

U digotin ku: "Ma qey bera eme ji bo þaireki din dev ji Xudayen xwe berdin
